tasks.label: npm install all (parallel)
args: $jobs = @(); Get-ChildItem -Directory | ForEach-Object { $dir = $_.FullName; $packageJsonPath = Join-Path -Path $dir -ChildPath "package.json"; if (Test-Path $packageJsonPath) { $jobs += Start-Job -ScriptBlock { param ($dir); Write-Host -ForegroundColor Yellow "Running 'npm install' in $dir"; Push-Location $dir; npm install; Pop-Location; } -ArgumentList $dir }}; $jobs | ForEach-Object { $job = $_; $job | Wait-Job; $job | Receive-Job; $job | Remove-Job; }; Write-Host -ForegroundColor Green "All npm install jobs have completed."
